name: Death Quest (ike3)
description:
An escape room-platformer. I know right, it sounds crazy but that is exactly what this game is. Dodge obstacles, solve puzzles and fight evil robots to to reach to the end. Make sure you have on your thinking cap because you are definitely going to need it.

How does this fit the theme of death. Oh, just you wait and find out as you will die quite a lot of times in this game. Not only because this game will be hard, but to actually win, you need to die. Not sure what I mean? Well, download and have a look for yourself.

Download the game for a better experience 

controls.

Move- WASD

Jump - Space 

Switch item - 1 and 2 or scroll wheel

Interact - E

Shoot - Left Mouse Button

Pause/resume - Escape
